review.summary: This is a simple __init__.py file that serves as a clean export module for event response models. The file follows Maximum Separation Architecture principles with proper documentation and explicit public API control through __all__ list. Contains only a single import and export for EventResponse model, maintaining excellent code organization standards.

Proper relative import pattern from .event_response maintains feature isolation
Maintains Maximum Separation Architecture principle - each response type gets its own file
Clean and minimal structure with no unnecessary complexity
Consistent with project patterns found in global scratchsheet
